DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety topical FP1198 treatment moderate severe cyclic breast pain ( cyclic mastalgia ) examine clinical activity FP1198 .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label , MultiCenter Evaluation Use Topically Administered FP1198 Subjects With Pain Associated With Cyclic Mastalgia
DOC.criteria: menstruate female least 18 year age BMI le 30 moderate severe breast pain associate menstrual cycle good general health pregnant within last 6 month take last 3 month currently take hormonal contraception history malignancy currently treat cancer breast genital organ breast implant breast reduction surgery
